
## This function plots the results from a simulation generated by <code>id_sim_gen</code>. {.unnumbered}


### Description

This function plots the results from a simulation generated by <code>id_sim_gen</code>.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>id_plot_sims(sims, type = "RMSE")
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="sims">sims</code></td>
<td>
A fitted <code>idealstan</code> object that has true data generated by <code>id_sim_gen</code>
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="type">type</code></td>
<td>
Type of analysis of true versus fitted values, can be <code>'RMSE'</code>, <code>'Residuals'</code> or <code>'Coverage'</code>
</td></tr>
</table>
